author: wtopstaff
title: Astros Postseason History
text:
By The Associated Press October 14, 2015 11:04 pm (Astros played in the NL 1962-2012; AL 2013-present) 
The postseason history of the Houston Astros: World Series (Won 0, Lost 1) 
2005 — Lost to Chicago White Sox, 4-0 
Record — Won 0, Lost 4 League Championship Series (Won 1, Lost 3) 
2005 — Beat St. Louis Cardinals, 4-2 
2004 — Lost to St. Louis Cardinals, 4-3 
1986 — Lost to New York Mets, 4-2 
1980 — Lost to Philadelphia Phillies, 3-2 
Record — Won 11, Lost 13 Division Championship Series (Won 2, Lost 6) 
2015 — Lost to Kansas City, 3-2 
2005 — Beat Atlanta Braves, 3-1 
2004 — Beat Atlanta Braves, 3-2 
2001 — Lost to Atlanta Braves, 3-0 
1999 — Lost to Atlanta Braves, 3-1 
1998 — Lost to San Diego Padres, 3-1 
1997 — Lost to Atlanta Braves, 3-0 
1981 — Lost to Los Angeles Dodgers, 3-2 
Record — Won 12, Lost 21 Wild Card Game (Won 1, Lost 0) 
2015 — Beat New York Yankees, 3-0 Topics:
